column4: New to ubuntu here.. tried it a long time ago and didn't like it taking another stab, but I can't seem to get my right click functionality on my clickpad (touchpad)
Anyone know how I enable it?
Dars... I have haha. People in this community always assume the worstwhen someone says they're new
If you don't tell what you have done how are we to know, it just wastes our time.  So many come on here with little or no details.
